item.title: Click me Right now
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

x andrew x:

Why do people not even try things themselves before wasting out time by asking simple questions.

im starting to cba coming to the client help section… because people dont bother to figure out the simplest of things anymore.
that surprises me too… because i learned alot from just messing with things and determining what they changed and how they worked.
